info.authenticated:
If you want to authenticate, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").
info.register: You don't have an account yet? Register a new account

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 5 characters.
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirmation password is required to be at least 5 characters.
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.minlength: Your e-mail is required to be at least 5 characters.
email.maxlength: Your e-mail cannot be longer than 50 characters.

error.authentication: Authentication failed! Please check your credentials and try again.

messages.success: Your user has been activated. Please authenticate.
messages.error: Your user could not be activated. Please use the registration form to sign up.
An error has occurred! The password could not be changed.

login.minlength: Your login is required to be at least 1 character
login.maxlength: Your login cannot be longer than 50 characters
login.pattern: Your login can only contain lower-case letters and digits

messages.success: Registration saved! Please check your email for confirmation.

error.userexists: Login name already registered! Please choose another one.
error.emailexists: E-mail is already in use! Please choose another one.

messages.info: Enter the e-mail address you used to register
messages.success: Check your e-mails for details on how to reset your password.
messages.notfound: E-Mail address isn't registered! Please check and try again

messages.success: Your password has been reset. Please authenticate.
messages.error: Your password couldn't be reset. Remember a password request is only valid for 24 hours.

error.fail: An error has occurred! Settings could not be saved.
error.emailexists: E-mail is already in use! Please choose another one.

firstname.minlength: Your first name is required to be at least 1 character
firstname.maxlength: Your first name cannot be longer than 50 characters

lastname.minlength: Your last name is required to be at least 1 character
lastname.maxlength: Your last name cannot be longer than 50 characters
